title: Fragment Of A Bag
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: Tapestry) dove-tailed, use of non-horizontal weft; diagonal flat interlacing; braiding–4-strand; sides stitched together to form bag; warp ends covered by stitching forming opening
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor in memory of Alexander M. Bing
description: Fragment of a small bag in geometric pattern in green, red, blue and light brown. Fringe at one end.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment Of A Bag.
Medium: wool
Technique: Tapestry) dove-tailed, use of non-horizontal weft; diagonal flat interlacing; braiding–4-strand; sides stitched together to form bag; warp ends covered by stitching forming opening. Gift of Anonymous Donor in memory of Alexander M. Bing. 1962-27-15.
